verses.verse: On that day <S%G2250><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out of the house, <S%G3614><s%> and was sitting <S%G2521><s%> by the sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> gathered <S%G4863><s%> to Him, so <S%G5620><s%> that He got <S%G1684><s%> into a boat <S%G4143><s%> and sat <S%G2521><s%> down, <S%G2521><s%> and the whole <S%G3956><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> was standing <S%G2476><s%> on the beach. <S%G123><s%>

And He spoke <S%G2980><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things <S%G4183><s%> to them in parables, <S%G3850><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the sower <S%G4687><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out to sow; <S%G4687><s%>

and as he sowed, <S%G4687><s%> some <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> [seeds] fell <S%G4098><s%> beside <S%G3844><s%> the road, <S%G3598><s%> and the birds <S%G4071><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and ate <S%G2719><s%> them up.

"And others <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> upon the rocky <S%G4075><s%> places, where <S%G3699><s%> they did not have <S%G2192><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> soil; <S%G1093><s%> and immediately <S%G2112><s%> they sprang <S%G1816><s%> up, because <S%G1223><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> depth <S%G899><s%> of soil. <S%G1093><s%>

"But when the sun <S%G2246><s%> had risen, <S%G393><s%> they were scorched; <S%G2739><s%> and because <S%G1223><s%> they had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> root, <S%G4491><s%> they withered <S%G3583><s%> away. <S%G3583><s%>
"And others <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> among <S%G1909><s%> the thorns, <S%G173><s%> and the thorns <S%G173><s%> came <S%G305><s%> up and choked <S%G638><s%> them out.

"And others <S%G243><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> on the good <S%G2570><s%> soil, <S%G1093><s%> and yielded <S%G1325><s%> a crop, <S%G2590><s%> some <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> a hundredfold, <S%G1540><s%> some <S%G3739><s%> sixty, <S%G1835><s%> and some <S%G3739><s%> thirty. <S%G5144><s%>
"He who has <S%G2192><s%> ears, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>"
And the disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> do You speak <S%G2980><s%> to them in parables <S%G3850><s%>?"

And He answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "To you it has been granted <S%G1325><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%> the mysteries <S%G3466><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> but to them it has not been granted. <S%G1325><s%>

"For whoever <S%G3748><s%> has, <S%G2192><s%> to him shall [more] be given, <S%G1325><s%> and he shall have <S%G4052><s%> an abundance; <S%G4052><s%> but whoever <S%G3748><s%> does not have, <S%G2192><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> he has <S%G2192><s%> shall be taken <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> from him.

"Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> to them in parables; <S%G3850><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> while seeing <S%G991><s%> they do not see, <S%G991><s%> and while hearing <S%G191><s%> they do not hear, <S%G191><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> do they understand. <S%G4920><s%>

"And in their case the prophecy <S%G4394><s%> of Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> is being fulfilled, <S%G378><s%> which says, <S%G3004><s%> 'You will keep <S%G189><s%> on hearing, <S%G191><s%> but will not understand; <S%G4920><s%> And you will keep <S%G991><s%> on seeing, <S%G991><s%> but will not perceive; <S%G3708><s%>

For the heart <S%G2588><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> has become <S%G3975><s%> dull, <S%G3975><s%> And with their ears <S%G3775><s%> they scarcely <S%G917><s%> hear, <S%G191><s%> And they have closed <S%G2576><s%> their eyes <S%G3788><s%> Lest <S%G3379><s%> they should see <S%G3708><s%> with their eyes, <S%G3788><s%> And hear <S%G191><s%> with their ears, <S%G3775><s%> And understand <S%G4920><s%> with their heart <S%G2588><s%> and return, <S%G1994><s%> And I should heal <S%G2390><s%> them.'
"But blessed <S%G3107><s%> are your eyes, <S%G3788><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they see; <S%G991><s%> and your ears, <S%G3775><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they hear. <S%G191><s%>

"For truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that many <S%G4183><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> and righteous <S%G1342><s%> men <S%G1342><s%> desired <S%G1937><s%> to see <S%G3708><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> you see, <S%G991><s%> and did not see <S%G3708><s%> [it]; and to hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> you hear, <S%G191><s%> and did not hear <S%G191><s%> [it].
"Hear <S%G191><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> the parable <S%G3850><s%> of the sower. <S%G4687><s%>

"When anyone <S%G3956><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of the kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and does not understand <S%G4920><s%> it, the evil <S%G4190><s%> [one] comes <S%G2064><s%> and snatches <S%G726><s%> away <S%G726><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> has been sown <S%G4687><s%> in his heart. <S%G2588><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is the one on whom seed was sown <S%G4687><s%> beside <S%G3844><s%> the road. <S%G3598><s%>

"And the one on whom seed was sown <S%G4687><s%> on the rocky <S%G4075><s%> places, this <S%G3778><s%> is the man who hears <S%G191><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> and immediately <S%G2117><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> it with joy; <S%G5479><s%>

yet <S%G1161><s%> he has <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> [firm] root <S%G4491><s%> in himself, <S%G1438><s%> but is [only] temporary, <S%G4340><s%> and when affliction <S%G2347><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> persecution <S%G1375><s%> arises <S%G1096><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the word, <S%G3056><s%> immediately <S%G2117><s%> he falls <S%G4624><s%> away. <S%G4624><s%>

"And the one on whom seed was sown <S%G4687><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the thorns, <S%G173><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is the man who hears <S%G191><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> and the worry <S%G3308><s%> of the world, <S%G165><s%> and the deceitfulness <S%G539><s%> of riches <S%G4149><s%> choke <S%G4846><s%> the word, <S%G3056><s%> and it becomes <S%G1096><s%> unfruitful. <S%G175><s%>

"And the one on whom seed was sown <S%G4687><s%> on the good <S%G2570><s%> soil, <S%G1093><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> is the man who hears <S%G191><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> and understands <S%G4920><s%> it; who <S%G3739><s%> indeed <S%G1211><s%> bears <S%G2592><s%> fruit, <S%G2592><s%> and brings <S%G4160><s%> forth, <S%G4160><s%> some <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3303><s%> a hundredfold, <S%G1540><s%> some <S%G3739><s%> sixty, <S%G1835><s%> and some <S%G3739><s%> thirty. <S%G5144><s%>"

He presented <S%G3908><s%> another <S%G243><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> may be compared <S%G3666><s%> to a man <S%G444><s%> who sowed <S%G4687><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> in his field <S%G68><s%>.

"But while <S%G1722><s%> men <S%G444><s%> were sleeping, <S%G2518><s%> his enemy <S%G2190><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and sowed <S%G7080><s%> tares <S%G2215><s%> also among <S%G303><s%> <S%G3319><s%> the wheat, <S%G4621><s%> and went <S%G565><s%> away. <S%G565><s%>

"But when <S%G3753><s%> the wheat <S%G5528><s%> sprang <S%G985><s%> up and bore <S%G4160><s%> grain, <S%G2590><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> the tares <S%G2215><s%> became <S%G5316><s%> evident <S%G5316><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

"And the slaves <S%G1401><s%> of the landowner <S%G3617><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'Sir, <S%G2962><s%> did you not sow <S%G4687><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> in your field <S%G68><s%>? How <S%G4159><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> does it have <S%G2192><s%> tares <S%G2215><s%>?'

"And he said <S%G5346><s%> to them, 'An enemy <S%G2190><s%> <S%G444><s%> has done <S%G4160><s%> this! <S%G3778><s%>' And the slaves <S%G1401><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, 'Do you want <S%G2309><s%> us, then, <S%G3767><s%> to go <S%G565><s%> and gather <S%G4816><s%> them up?'
"But he said, <S%G5346><s%> 'No; <S%G3756><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> while you are gathering <S%G4816><s%> up the tares, <S%G2215><s%> you may root <S%G1610><s%> up the wheat <S%G4621><s%> with them.

'Allow <S%G863><s%> both <S%G297><s%> to grow <S%G4885><s%> together <S%G4885><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the harvest; <S%G2326><s%> and in the time <S%G2540><s%> of the harvest <S%G2326><s%> I will say <S%G3004><s%> to the reapers, <S%G2327><s%> "First <S%G4413><s%> gather <S%G4816><s%> up the tares <S%G2215><s%> and bind <S%G1210><s%> them in bundles <S%G1197><s%> to burn <S%G2618><s%> them up; but gather <S%G4863><s%> the wheat <S%G4621><s%> into my barn. <S%G596><s%>"' "

He presented <S%G3908><s%> another <S%G243><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> a mustard <S%G4615><s%> seed, <S%G2848><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> and sowed <S%G4687><s%> in his field; <S%G68><s%>

and this <S%G3739><s%> is smaller <S%G3398><s%> than all <S%G3956><s%> [other] seeds; <S%G4690><s%> but when <S%G3752><s%> it is full <S%G837><s%> grown, <S%G837><s%> it is larger <S%G3173><s%> than the garden <S%G3001><s%> plants, <S%G3001><s%> and becomes <S%G1096><s%> a tree, <S%G1186><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that the birds <S%G4071><s%> of the air <S%G3772><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> and nest <S%G2681><s%> in its branches. <S%G2798><s%> "

He spoke <S%G2980><s%> another <S%G243><s%> parable <S%G3850><s%> to them, "The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> leaven, <S%G2219><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> a woman <S%G1135><s%> took, <S%G2983><s%> and hid <S%G1470><s%> in three <S%G5140><s%> pecks <S%G4568><s%> of meal, <S%G224><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> it was all <S%G3650><s%> leavened. <S%G2220><s%>"

All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> to the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> in parables, <S%G3850><s%> and He did not speak <S%G2980><s%> to them without <S%G5565><s%> a parable, <S%G3850><s%>

so <S%G3704><s%> that what <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G3004><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "I will open <S%G455><s%> My mouth <S%G4750><s%> in parables; <S%G3850><s%> I will utter <S%G2044><s%> things <S%G2928><s%> hidden <S%G2928><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> He left <S%G863><s%> the multitudes, <S%G3793><s%> and went <S%G2064><s%> into the house. <S%G3614><s%> And His disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Explain <S%G1285><s%> to us the parable <S%G3850><s%> of the tares <S%G2215><s%> of the field. <S%G68><s%>"
And He answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "The one who sows <S%G4687><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> seed <S%G4690><s%> is the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man, <S%G444><s%>

and the field <S%G68><s%> is the world; <S%G2889><s%> and [as for] the good <S%G2570><s%> seed, <S%G4690><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are the sons <S%G5207><s%> of the kingdom; <S%G932><s%> and the tares <S%G2215><s%> are the sons <S%G5207><s%> of the evil <S%G4190><s%> [one;]

and the enemy <S%G2190><s%> who sowed <S%G4687><s%> them is the devil, <S%G1228><s%> and the harvest <S%G2326><s%> is the end <S%G4930><s%> of the age; <S%G165><s%> and the reapers <S%G2327><s%> are angels. <S%G32><s%>

"Therefore <S%G3767><s%> just <S%G5618><s%> as the tares <S%G2215><s%> are gathered <S%G4816><s%> up and burned <S%G2618><s%> with fire, <S%G4442><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall it be at the end <S%G4930><s%> of the age. <S%G165><s%>

"The Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> will send <S%G649><s%> forth <S%G649><s%> His angels, <S%G32><s%> and they will gather <S%G4816><s%> out of His kingdom <S%G932><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> stumbling <S%G4625><s%> blocks, <S%G4625><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who commit <S%G4160><s%> lawlessness, <S%G458><s%>

and will cast <S%G906><s%> them into the furnace <S%G2575><s%> of fire; <S%G4442><s%> in that place <S%G1563><s%> there shall be weeping <S%G2805><s%> and gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>

"Then <S%G5119><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> will shine <S%G1584><s%> forth <S%G1584><s%> as the sun <S%G2246><s%> in the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of their Father. <S%G3962><s%> He who has <S%G2192><s%> ears, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear. <S%G191><s%>

"The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> a treasure <S%G2344><s%> hidden <S%G2928><s%> in the field, <S%G68><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> and hid; <S%G2928><s%> and from joy <S%G5479><s%> over it he goes <S%G5217><s%> and sells <S%G4453><s%> all <S%G3745><s%> that he has, <S%G2192><s%> and buys <S%G59><s%> that field. <S%G68><s%>
"Again, <S%G3825><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> a merchant <S%G1713><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> fine <S%G2570><s%> pearls, <S%G3135><s%>

and upon finding <S%G2147><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> pearl <S%G3135><s%> of great <S%G4186><s%> value, <S%G4186><s%> he went <S%G565><s%> and sold <S%G4097><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that he had, <S%G2192><s%> and bought <S%G59><s%> it.

"Again, <S%G3825><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> a dragnet <S%G4522><s%> cast <S%G906><s%> into the sea, <S%G2281><s%> and gathering <S%G4863><s%> [fish] of every <S%G3956><s%> kind; <S%G1085><s%>

and when <S%G3753><s%> it was filled, <S%G4137><s%> they drew <S%G307><s%> it up on the beach; <S%G123><s%> and they sat <S%G2523><s%> down, <S%G2523><s%> and gathered <S%G4816><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> [fish] into containers, <S%G7001><s%> but the bad <S%G4550><s%> they threw <S%G906><s%> away. <S%G1854><s%>

"So <S%G3779><s%> it will be at the end <S%G4930><s%> of the age; <S%G165><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> shall come <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and take <S%G873><s%> out the wicked <S%G4190><s%> from among <S%G3319><s%> the righteous, <S%G1342><s%>
and will cast <S%G906><s%> them into the furnace <S%G2575><s%> of fire; <S%G4442><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall be weeping <S%G2805><s%> and gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>
" Have you understood <S%G4920><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%>?" They said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Yes. <S%G3483><s%>"

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> scribe <S%G1122><s%> who has become <S%G3100><s%> a disciple <S%G3100><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> a head <S%G3617><s%> of a household, <S%G3617><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> brings <S%G1544><s%> forth <S%G1544><s%> out of his treasure <S%G2344><s%> things <S%G2537><s%> new <S%G2537><s%> and old. <S%G3820><s%>"
And it came <S%G1096><s%> about that when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had finished <S%G5055><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> parables, <S%G3850><s%> He departed <S%G3332><s%> from there. <S%G1564><s%>

And coming <S%G2064><s%> to His home <S%G3968><s%> town <S%G3968><s%> He [began] teaching <S%G1321><s%> them in their synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that they became astonished, <S%G1605><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Where <S%G4159><s%> [did] this <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G3778><s%> [get] this <S%G3778><s%> wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> and [these] miraculous <S%G1411><s%> powers <S%G1411><s%>?

"Is not this <S%G3778><s%> the carpenter's son <S%G5207><s%>? Is not His mother <S%G3384><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> and His brothers, <S%G80><s%> James <S%G2385><s%> and Joseph <S%G2501><s%> and Simon <S%G4613><s%> and Judas <S%G2455><s%>?
